name: intgr-lk.yml
configuration:
spring:
  application:
    name: nttm-intgr-lk
#    active: local
server:
  port: 8283
nttm:
  prefix: "http://127.0.0.1:8080"
  auth:
    username: "lk_intgr"
    password: "j4RGZL9LPV3EKEAPDuXm"
  closeValue: "Закрыт"
  defaultProcessName: "ttm_rule2"
  tt:
    maxReturn: 1000
  tasks:
    types:
      registrationTypeId: 1
      diagTypeId: 2
      autoCloseTypeId: 21 # ожидание
    codes:
      termCloseCodesId:  30, 36, 84
      reOpenCloseCodeId: 84
    statuses:
      workStatusId: 3
      queueStatusId: 2
  sourceSystemCatalog: cat_source_system
  sourceSystemName: ЛК B2B
  create-tt:
    validation:
      mandatoryFields: problemCategory, serviceType, problemType, description, orderUnid
    typeMapping:
      Internet: Интернет
      VPN: VPN
    subTypeMapping:
      Internet: Выделенный доступ в интернет (корпоративные клиенты)
      VPN: VPN
  get-info:
    nameMapping:
      problemStartDate: "fldLRPCreatedDateTime"
      clientUNID: "fldOrganizationUNID"
      orderUNID: "fldOrderUnid"
      typeName: "fldProblemType"
      serviceType: "fldServiceType"
      categoryName: "fldProblemCategory"
      description: "fldProblemDescriptionBreif"
      lastActiveTask: "fldWFStatus"
      issueName: "fldProblemReason"
      id: "fldLRPNumber"
      subtypeName: "fldServiceView"
      author: "fldCreatorPersonName"
      problemSource: "fldProblemSource"
      curatorName: "fldCoordinatorPersonName"
      priority: "fldPriority"
      point2Address: "fldPoint2Address"
      point2Interface: "fldPoint2Interface"
      ipAddressCE: "fldIPAddressCE"
      speed: "fldSpeed"
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
